page.title: 05MY FIRST DAY AT A NEW SCHOOL
page.content: My first day at secondary school was a very nerve-wracking one! I very much wished to be back at my junior school. I arrived at King Edward VI Comprehensive School on Tuesday 4th September l984 and I was immediately terrified by the size of it! As I came from a school that was outside the catchment area,I knew nobody there! I walked around dodging anyone who came near me! One of the first things that we did was to go on a tour of the school and I felt sure that I would never be able to find my way around and would always be lost (although, in fact, I haven't been lost yet, and i've nearly been here a year now!). The very first lesson we had was Science and we were given the "Rules of the Laboratory" to learn. It was all very alarming and I was glad to go home
